doc.title: Johnny Unicron the Apocalypse Warrior
doc.plot: In the post Apocalyptic future, few have survived and now live in anarchy on the island of Hawaii. In the midst of the turmoil a warrior is born, his name: Johnny Unicron. After being raised by Samurai and trained in martial arts, Johnny wanders the post apocalyptic world fighting oppression and injustice. But a new evil arises, a ruthless tyrant named Genghis Fong. He controls the world with an army of aquatic ninjas and henchman. After reluctantly joining 'The Rebellion,' Johnny begins his journey to defeat Genghis Fong, with the help of his Kung Fu expert sidekick "Jargon Legomax," his secretary "Pilot Virtuoso," and a beautiful samurai named 'Coral Snow.' The greatest Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi, Kung Fu, Samurai Western spoof movie ever made.
